wikipedia_page.main: Emilio Pacione (1920 – 25 August 2012) was a Scottish footballer who played as a winger best known for playing for Dundee United from 1945 to 1950.Pacione also played for Lochee Harp, Coleraine and Brechin City.

response: * 25 August: Emilio Pacione, 92, Dundee United winger.The Courier
